meta_title: What is Cross-Contamination? Definition and Industrial Impact
meta_description: Cross-contamination is the transfer of impurities between equipment or products. Understand its impact on industrial safety and how to prevent it in 2026.
title: What is Cross-Contamination?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Cross-Contamination?

image_prompt: A high-end, photo-realistic industrial scene in a sterile manufacturing facility. A maintenance professional wearing full PPE (white lab coat, hairnet, and gloves) is inspecting a stainless steel conveyor system with a digital tablet. The environment is brightly lit, clean, and features modern machinery with visible color-coded safety markers. No text in the image.
